comment: I took her online for marketing research 4100. She is awful! She does not respond to e-mails whatsoever. Assignments are fairly easy as far as length and content but she is a tough grader. Does not post grades so you never know your grade. Come off as rude in tutorial videos and messages to class which are rare. I would not take her if I were you.
Weekly quizzes, five group assignments plus one group marketing research report, three exams including final. Class felt mostly self taught.

I took this class as a business elective and this has to be the worst professor I have had in a long time.  The course work is not hard, although tests were not even closely based off course material.  My group and I have yet to get into contact with her and we have finished the class, even after reaching out to the department head.   Not good.

Dr. Carley was a nice lady but very unorganized and hard to understand in terms of what she wanted. Due dates were also confusing because she would sometimes switch dates around or give us a 1 or 2 day notice when something was due. Group projects were the MOST confusing thing EVER! I should've really gotten an A in the class but I ended with a B.

This professor was the worst I have ever had. I got an A and everything was easy but I didn't learn a single thing about international marketing. She is unorganized, confused, doesn't care, and doesn't adhere to here syllabus. There's a quiz every week, 4 easy tests, and one pointless PowerPoint project. It's easy, but a struggle overall.

This class was horrible. 4 tests plus a cumulative final. 22 chapters = not fun.  She's an easy grader on assignments, but man this lady is unorganized. The schedule she provides at the start of the class is not the schedule that she will follow throughout the class.

So I took Carley for INTL MKTG as well, and thought that the reason  I got a B in the class was because I didn't understand the content as well. I am now in her Services MKTG class and while I get 100s on all her quizzes, I fail her tests no matter how much I study. They are ridiculous! Do not Take her. She is no help and the work load is awful!

I emailed her on several occasions and I never heard back from her at all.  Grades discussions pretty easy... just make sure to do them.  If you are the type of person that likes to know how you are doing in a class.... don't take her!
took her online. she's very unclear. no one knew what was going on the whole semester. avoid taking this professor
the most rude, unhelpful, and condescending professor I have ever had. The workload is not too bad but she is very unclear in regards to her expectations.

The most condescending, unprofessional, and rude professor I've ever had. On some sort of power trip. Would be willing to overlook the fact that her "teaching" is only manufactured ppt slides if she wasn't in angry middle school teacher mode. Tests/quizzes are over so fast they're more like reaction time tests, not knowledge. Avoid if possible

Class was easy. Had almost weekly individual assignments that are used in team presentation. There were 4 exams. She?s unorganized, doesn?t respond to emails quickly, but is fair. Comes across as not helpful, expects you to be able to do work because it?s a 4000 level course. Ask, she will help.
Good class, took MKTG 3100 online.  Professor can be brash with emails, but more than fair and flexible overall

She's a bit unorganized, but that can be to the students advantage because she is flexible due to the confusion. I would suggest taking her for 4100 due to the negative feedback about other professors.

Took mktg 4820 online with her and it was a very light work load compared to other professors that give online classes. Quizzes, Discussions, and Tests are all you have to worry about. She's a bit unorganized but understands and is flexible.

A couple of things- 1) she talks to you in a very condescending way.  2)What she doesnt realize is that STUDENTS are not PHD's like her. We are there to learn from our mistakes not to be treated like 7 year olds. Her work load is fair and uses the info from the textbook for tests. She is very slow in getting back to you with emails.
Took this class on line. Fair amount of work but requires final exam on campus. Can be accusatory on emails so watch what you ask her. Just OK not bad.
I would recommend. Not the most exciting class but she is very fair professor.

Dr. Carley is pretty much a scatter brain. She never really explains what she wants in the group project. she is very strict with attendance but when it comes to lectures you could teach yourself.. it's right in the book. she's very nice and understanding but rarely checks her e-mail or answers back.

Dr. Carley is very nice.  Her lectures are okay, and she gives 4 homework assignments. Her tests come from the text; but, she gives good study guides.  I've made A's on most of the tests(3) and still have the final to take.  There is one group project (not bad).
She is the worst teacher I've ever had in my entire career at KSU. If you know what's good for you, do not take her.
She is great!
Tests come from book, not lectures. Take online quizzes and you'll do great. Group project is a pain, but at least it is due in segments so you aren't swamped at the end, plus she just skims them.
Don't take her.  Lectures are powerpoint and are very boring.  Strict on attendance also.  Her tests are ridiculous.  They don't match what you learn in class or in the book.
Great teacher!!
No Comments
